headline: Corning (GLW)’s a “Potential Winner,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 9 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer talked about. Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) is a glassworks company with a presence in the data center, consumer electronics, and other industries. It performed well in 2025, and the shares are up by 84% over the past year. […]

headline: Corning (GLW) Valuation Check As AI Data Center Demand And CES Awards Lift Investor Interest
summary: Corning (GLW) is back in focus as investors weigh three fresh catalysts at once: upcoming Q4 2025 earnings, growing interest in its AI data center exposure, and new CES recognition for its glass technologies. See our latest analysis for Corning. Despite a recent soft patch, with a 1-month share price return of a 6.34% decline and a 1-day move of a 3.02% decline to US$85.33, Corning’s 1-year total shareholder return of 82.17% and 3-year total shareholder return of about 1.5x highlight that...

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Ciena, Lumentum and Corning
summary: Ciena is riding surging AI-driven network demand, posting strong growth and raising its outlook as cloud and data center spending accelerates.

headline: Wall Street Has a Positive Opinion on Corning (GLW) Incorporated Ahead of Q4 2025
summary: Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) is one of the Best Unstoppable Growth Stocks to Buy Right Now. Wall Street has a positive opinion on Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) ahead of its fiscal Q4 2025 earnings expected to be released on January 28. Recently, on December 30, Samik Chatterjee from J.P. Morgan reiterated a buy rating on the stock […]
